Description: Solid-cast copper alloy model offering-table, rectangular, with a kneeling figure at back, with 2 jars and 2 loaves before, frog at front above channel, and 2 suspension loops at back.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Prof Walter B Emery
Findspot: Found/Acquired: Saqqara (Memphis), H5-2511 Hawk Gallery 16 Cache 9
Curator's comments: Published in: S. Davies and H.S. Smith, The sacred animal necropolis at North Saqqara, MEES 73, 2005, p. 114
Bibliographic references: Insley Green 1987 / The temple furniture from the sacred animal necropolis at North Saqqara, 1964-1976 (451)
